inclusion.criterion: Consecutive patients reporting to the study center
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: MDR-TB defined as resistance to at least the following two drugs: Isoniazid and Rifampicin.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Previous history of taking any of the following: kanamycin, prothionamide, levofloxacin, cycloserine and p-aminosalicylic acid
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient A is a 30-year-old male who was admitted to the hospital after 10 days of cough, profuse nocturnal sweating and loss of appetite.
